pageProps.data:
## GaussianBlur

###### Description

This operation is default blur operation which actually
 convolution with Gaussian kernel.

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The source image to be grayscaled.|
|**kernelSize**|<var>number</var>|Size of the kernel.|
|**sigma**|<var>number</var>|Sigma coeficient value.|

###### Example

```js
gm.gaussianBlur(inputImage, 5, 3);
```
